statements: UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara', ingredient_list = ARRAY['pasta', 'eggs', 'bacon', 'cheese'], preparation_steps = ARRAY['Cook pasta', 'Mix eggs and cheese', 'Fry bacon', 'Combine all ingredients'], difficulty_level = 2, nutrition_info = 'High in protein' WHERE recipe_id = 1;

UPDATE recipes SET ingredient_list = ARRAY['chicken', 'vegetables', 'rice'], difficulty_level = 1, preparation_steps = ARRAY['Cook rice', 'Saute vegetables', 'Grill chicken', 'Combine all ingredients'], nutrition_info = 'Balanced meal', recipe_name = 'Healthy Stir-Fry' WHERE recipe_id = 2;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'Spicy Chicken Pasta', ingredient_list = ARRAY['chicken', 'pasta', 'tomato sauce'], difficulty_level = 3 WHERE recipe_id = 101;

UPDATE recipes SET preparation_steps = ARRAY['1. Boil pasta', '2. Cook chicken in a pan', '3. Mix everything together'], nutrition_info = 'Calories: 450, Protein: 30g, Carbs: 50g' WHERE recipe_name = 'Spicy Chicken Pasta';
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name='Spaghetti Carbonara', instructions='Cook spaghetti, fry bacon, mix with eggs and cheese' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE nutrition_tips SET tip_title='Healthy Eating Tips', tip_description='Eat more fruits and vegetables to stay healthy' WHERE tip_id=2;
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients='1 cup flour, 2 eggs, 1 tsp salt', instructions='Mix flour, eggs, and salt together' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE nutrition_tips SET tip_description='Here are some tips to improve your nutrition: eat more fruits and vegetables, drink plenty of water, and avoid sugary drinks' WHERE tip_id=1;
UPDATE tutorial SET description='New Description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE nutrition_tip SET tip_description='Healthy Eating Tips' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE tutorial SET description = 'Updated Description', title = 'New Title' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE user_ratings SET rating = 5, tutorial_id = 2 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE recipes SET instructions = 'Bake for 20 minutes at 350°F, then serve hot' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', password = 'newpassword123' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = 'Updated ingredients', instructions = 'New instructions' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', password = 'newpassword123' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE recipe SET ingredients = 'updated ingredients', instructions = 'updated instructions' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE nutrition SET calories = 500, protein = 20 WHERE recipe_id = 2;
UPDATE recipe SET ingredients = 'Tomatoes, Cheese, Basil' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE nutrition SET calories = 300, protein = 20 WHERE recipe_id = 1;
